show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016
other_title: Doraemon - Il film: Nobita e la nascita del Giappone (Italian)
Doraemon y el nacimiento de Japón (Spanish)
Eiga Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Nippon Tanjō (Japanese)
映画ドラえもん 新・のび太の日本誕生 (Japanese)
电影哆啦A梦 新‧大雄的日本誕生 (Chinese (PRC))
電影哆啦A夢 新‧大雄的日本誕生 (Chinese (Taiwan))
電影多啦A夢 新·大雄之日本誕生 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: Nobita gets scolded constantly at school and at home, and travels in a time machine to Japan 70,000 years in the past with friends who each have their own reasons for running away from home. They decide to return home after enjoying their private paradise in prehistoric Japan, but for some reason in the present day they meet a primitive boy named Kukuru.
